rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Missouri has not reported any H5 infections in dairy cattle, although there have been some cases reported in commercial poultry or backyard flocks and wild birds, according to the CDC.

rationale: The segment reports cases in different animal types factually.
